AliasGroup.name: First Mob
AliasGroup.script:
--syntax: setmob OR setmob xxx
mob=mob or {}
if matches[3] then mob.first = matches[4] cecho("Mob is set as: <gold>"..matches[4].."
") elseif mob.first then cecho("Mob is set as: <gold>"..mob.first.."
") else cecho("<red>Mob not set!
") end

Alias.name: Set Mob Target
Alias.script:
--syntax: mobtgt OR mobtgt xxx
mob=mob or {}
if matches[3] then mob.target=matches[4] cecho("Mob target is set as: <gold>"..matches[4].."
") elseif mob.target then cecho("Mob target is set as: <gold>"..mob.target.."
") else cecho("<red>No target specified!
") end

Alias.name: Order Mob Kill
Order Mob Bash
Order Mob Assist
Order Mob Rescue
Order Mob Sit
Delete Mob
Delete Mob Target
Order Mob Follow
Order Mob Bash Target
Order Mob Disengage
Order Mob Flee
Order Mob

AliasGroup.name: Second Mob
AliasGroup.script:
--syntax: setmobs OR setmobs xxx
mob=mob or {}
if matches[3] then mob.second = matches[4] cecho("Mob is set as: <gold>"..matches[4].."
") elseif mob.second then cecho("Mob is set as: <gold>"..mob.second.."
") else cecho("<red>Mob not set!
") end

Alias.name: Set Mob Target
Alias.script:
--syntax: mobtgt OR mobtgt xxx
mob=mob or {}
if matches[3] then mob.targets=matches[4] cecho("Mob target is set as: <gold>"..matches[4].."
") elseif mob.target then cecho("Mob target is set as: <gold>"..mob.targets.."
") else cecho("<red>No target specified!
") end
